typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CORG_DIM_ORGA_SK as string,
		CORG_MANDT as string,
		CORG_VKORG as string,
		CORG_VTWEG as string,
		CORG_KOKRS as string,
		CORG_BUKRS as string,
		CORG_SPRAS as string,
		CORG_BUTXT as string,
		CORG_ORT01 as string,
		CORG_LAND1 as string,
		CORG_VKORG_VTEXT as string,
		CORG_VTWEG_VTEXT as string,
		CORG_KOKRS_BEZEI as string,
		CORG_HASHKEY_BK as string,
		CORG_HASHKEY_DATA as string,
		CORG_CREATED_ON as string,
		CORG_SOURCE as string,
		CORG_VALID_FROM as string,
		CORG_VALID_TO as string,
		CORG_CURRENT_FLAG as string,
		CORG_DML_STRAT as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT * FROM CORE.DIM_ORGA',
	format: 'query') ~> sourceCoreOrga
sourceCoreOrga derive(CORG_DIM_ORGA_SK = 0,
		CORG_MANDT = toInteger(CORG_MANDT),
		CORG_VKORG = 'DUMMY',
		CORG_VTWEG = 'DUMMY',
		CORG_KOKRS = 'DUMMY',
		CORG_BUKRS = 'DUMMY',
		CORG_SPRAS = 'DUMMY',
		CORG_BUTXT = 'DUMMY',
		CORG_ORT01 = 'DUMMY',
		CORG_LAND1 = 'DUMMY',
		CORG_VKORG_VTEXT = 'DUMMY',
		CORG_VTWEG_VTEXT = 'DUMMY',
		CORG_KOKRS_BEZEI = 'DUMMY',
		CORG_HASHKEY_BK = 'DUMMY',
		CORG_HASHKEY_DATA = 'DUMMY',
		CORG_CREATED_ON = toDate('29991231 00:00:00.0000000'),
		CORG_SOURCE = 'DUMMY',
		CORG_VALID_FROM = toDate('29991231 00:00:00.0000000'),
		CORG_VALID_TO = toDate('29991231 00:00:00.0000000'),
		CORG_CURRENT_FLAG = 'DUMMY',
		CORG_DML_STRAT = 'DUMMY') ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		CORG_DIM_ORGA_SK,
		CORG_MANDT,
		CORG_VKORG,
		CORG_VTWEG,
		CORG_KOKRS,
		CORG_BUKRS,
		CORG_SPRAS,
		CORG_BUTXT,
		CORG_ORT01,
		CORG_LAND1,
		CORG_VKORG_VTEXT,
		CORG_VTWEG_VTEXT,
		CORG_KOKRS_BEZEI,
		CORG_HASHKEY_BK,
		CORG_HASHKEY_DATA,
		CORG_CREATED_ON,
		CORG_SOURCE,
		CORG_VALID_FROM,
		CORG_VALID_TO,
		CORG_CURRENT_FLAG,
		CORG_DML_STRAT
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> OrderCol
OrderCol sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	preSQLs:['TRUNCATE TABLE CORE.DIM_ORGA'],
	postSQLs:['INSERT INTO [CORE].[DIM_ORGA]\n           ([CORG_DIM_ORGA_SK]\n           ,[CORG_MANDT]\n           ,[CORG_VKORG]\n           ,[CORG_VTWEG]\n           ,[CORG_KOKRS]\n           ,[CORG_BUKRS]\n           ,[CORG_SPRAS]\n           ,[CORG_BUTXT]\n           ,[CORG_ORT01]\n           ,[CORG_LAND1]\n           ,[CORG_VKORG_VTEXT]\n           ,[CORG_VTWEG_VTEXT]\n           ,[CORG_KOKRS_BEZEI]\n           ,[CORG_HASHKEY_BK]\n           ,[CORG_HASHKEY_DATA]\n           ,[CORG_CREATED_ON]\n           ,[CORG_SOURCE]\n           ,[CORG_VALID_FROM]\n           ,[CORG_VALID_TO]\n           ,[CORG_CURRENT_FLAG]\n           ,[CORG_DML_STRAT])\n     VALUES\n           (0\n           ,999\n           ,\'DUMMY\'\n           ,\'DUMMY\'\n           ,\'DUMMY\'\n           ,\'DUMMY\'\n           ,\'DUMMY\'\n           ,\'DUMMY\'\n           ,\'DUMMY\'\n           ,\'DUMMY\'\n           ,\'DUMMY\'\n           ,\'DUMMY\'\n           ,\'DUMMY\'\n           ,\'DUMMY\'\n           ,\'DUMMY\'\n           ,\'29991231 00:00:00.0000000\'\n           ,\'DUMMY\'\n           ,\'29991231 00:00:00.0000000\'\n           ,\'29991231 00:00:00.0000000\'\n           ,\'Y\'\n           ,\'DUMMY\')'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
